summary: Sriracha has earned a cult following, but the story of this spicy sauce is a mystery to most fans. Dedicated to Sriracha lovers, this documentary travels around the globe to reveal its origin and the man behind the iconic "rooster sauce."
cast: Randy Clemens|Jordan Crowder|Harold Dieterle|Oz du Soleil|Adam Holliday|Jet Tila|David Tran|Craig Underwood|Kevin Strahle
title: Sriracha
